resources.string: A mock application experience that showcases the benefits of various design patterns for dual-screen foldable devices in a mobile, on-the-go scenario. Developers and designers can use this app as a conversation starter for their own explorations. To see the benefits of foldables in this use case, please span/maximize the application.
Drag the app across the hinge to span the app
There are no stores in the area you are looking at. Please go back to your current location.

%1$s Music is family owned and operated and has been in business since 1931. After all these years, we are still passionate about helping others make music. Whether you\'re picking up the guitar for the very first time or a first-chair virtuoso, %1$s Music gives musicians the tools they need to pursue their passion. Our educational services representatives work with local school districts to help support and grow their music programs, offering free instrument pickup and delivery from schools all over the state of Washington and providing complimentary services at many school music events.
%1$s is the pinnacle of craftsmanship, quality, and sound excellence.

An android app that showcases all the dual screen design patterns, sdks and code snippets. Created by the Microsoft Foldables Developer Experience Team.
Have Feedback? We’d love to hear it, but please don’t share sensitive information. Please reach out to the developer experience team at Surface Duo for any feedback.
